doctor.name: Dr. Lita Parvin

doctor.specialty: Skin, Sex, Hair, Allergy Specialist & Dermato-Cosmetic Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Lita Parvin is a Dermatologist in Kushtia. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DDV (Skin & Sex), Fellow (Dermato & Cosmetic Surgery). She is a Consultant, Dermatology & Venerology at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Lita Parvin at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 10am to 2pm (Friday), 3:30pm to 7:30pm (Sat, Mon & Wednesday).

chamber.address: City Tower, House # 01, Mir Mosharraf Hossain Road, Coart Para, Kushtia
